description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Leaning Tower" mini-game!
It seems the people down below are feeling quite down, but what could be the reason?
Hmm――It appears that the leaning tower is not leaning enough. That's certainly a serious issue.
Understood. Let's use the power of the heavens to lean the tower to the absolute limit.
Alright, here we go!
name: Additional mini-game "Leaning Tower"
